entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
